body:
This is a dummy pull request created so that developers of [xSDK packages](https://xsdk.info) can review their `package.py` files in Spack.  This file is already integrated in Spack, we're just making a PR so that it can be commented on.

See:
- [superlu-dist/package.py](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/blob/develop/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/superlu-dist/package.py) and 
- [superlu-mt/package.py](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/blob/develop/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/superlu-mt/package.py)

in the mainline `develop` branch to see blame for particular lines of code. This can be informative, because you can see the commits the code came from and why it's there.
title: [xSDK] SuperLU package review
